about_the_game:
Engage in intense warfare in the sands of multiple desert arenas with 'Warzone Chronicles: Battlegrounds.' This first-person shooter delivers a relentless multiplayer experience where strategy and action collide. Select from a variety of arenas, each with its unique layout and challenges, and dive into thrilling combat scenarios. Play with friends or solo, opting for team deathmatch, capture the flag, or free-for-all modes, all adaptable with or without bots.

With an extensive array of customizable settings, tailor your gameplay experience to perfection. From choosing between gamepad or keyboard controls, adjusting field of view, to fine-tuning graphics settings, the game offers flexibility to suit your preferences.

Moreover, immerse yourself in the battle with the revolutionary Perspectacles immersive ability. These optional enhancements bring the game to life, allowing you to step into the heat of combat with unparalleled immersion, heightening your senses and amplifying your gaming experience.

Warzone Chronicles:

Battlegrounds welcomes you to the frontline of action-packed, versatile gameplay. Join the fight, strategize, and dominate the competition in this epic first-person shooter.

Note: Perspectacles are not mandatory for gameplay but offer an unparalleled immersive experience when used.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
